name: msg.payload
func:
var task_obj = msg.req.body;

msg.payload = {
        _id                         : task_obj._id,
        _rev                        : task_obj._rev,
        task_name                   : task_obj.task_name,
        user_id                     : task_obj.user_id,
        page_id                     : task_obj.page_id,
        from_page_id                : task_obj.from_page_id,
        parent_id                   : task_obj.parent_id,
        header_template_id          : task_obj.header_template_id,
        detail_template_id          : task_obj.detail_template_id,
        footer_template_id          : task_obj.footer_template_id,
        timeout_id                  : task_obj.timeout_id,
        child_default_task_id       : task_obj.child_default_task_id,
        child_default_task_name     : task_obj.child_default_task_name,
        date_created                : task_obj.date_created,
        type                        : task_obj.type,
        status                      : task_obj.status,
        category                    : task_obj.category,
        additional_data_fn          : task_obj.additional_data_fn,
        optional_data               : task_obj.optional_data,
        required_data               : task_obj.required_data,
        offline_expiration_time     : task_obj.offline_expiration_time,
        display_if_empty            : task_obj.display_if_empty,
        image                       : task_obj.image
    };
    
msg.api_result = {status: 200, error: false, msg: "Record udpated successfully", data: msg.payload};
return msg;
